The claim states that unvaccinated peopl: be restricted from travel, voting, and commerce, and undergo a three-month lockdown. Vaccinated people will wear blue masks and be allowed some travel, regulated commerce, automated voting, and required social distancing.
The flyer claiming the existence of a: National Mask Code" with color-coded masks based on vaccination status was shared online.
The Utah Department of Health: s official Twitter account confirmed that the information on the flyer is false and that there are no restrictions based on vaccination status.
President: elect Joe Biden does not have the legal authority to implement a nationwide mask requirement, but he can urge governors, mayors, and counties to mandate mask-wearing in their respective jurisdictions.
